Description: Seizure annotations as marked by visual inspection of the data. This can be used to describe one particular recording.
Author: Penfield

LabelDescription.EpilepsySoz: The region where the clinical seizures originate.
LabelDescription.EpilepsyIrritativeZone: Region of cortex that generates interictal epileptiform discharges but not seizures
LabelDescription.EpilepsyEarlyPropagationZone: Region of cortex that generates the initial seizure symptoms. Not seizure onset, but the propagation of seizure from SOZ into this region.
LabelDescription.EpilepsyProvoked: Seizure or epileptiform activity are provoked with electrical stimulation.
